" AndroFotoFinder
Version $versionName$
$about$

Minimal requirements: Android 4.0 (API 14), internet/wifi-connection to download geodata and a SD-Card to cache geodata and to store photos

Licence: GPLv3

Requred permissions:

  • INTERNET: to download map data from Open Streetmap Server
  • ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE and ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: to find out if wifi/internet is online to start downloading geodata if neccessary
  • WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE to cache downloaded map data in local file system

The code uses

  • osmdroid library to display maps from Open Street Map
  • chris bane's PhotoView that implemnts the zoomable image view
  • drew noakes metadata-extractor to display extended exif infos
  • slf4j logging for java with the https://github.com/lp0/slf4j-android driver
  • junit Testing support with Mockito

History

Version v0.4.1
  • Image-Detail-View: implemented Share/Edit/Rename/Delete/Copy/Move
Version v0.4.0.150816
  • Gallery-View: implemented Multi selection mode: Share/Delete/Copy/Move/CreateFolder/Write-Log
Initial Version v0.3.4.150728
